data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Gao, Mali to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gao, Mali
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 3,611 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Gao.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 3,611 believers in Gao, Mali a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 544,100 people living in Gao.
Lord, remember the Tuareg, Tamajaq people. Make the Tuareg, Tamajaq people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, the believers in the state of Gao, Mali need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, move the 3,611 believers in the state of Gao to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.section_summary:
the state of Gao, Mali has a population of 544,100.

We estimate Gao has 3,611 people who might know Jesus, 11,629 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 528,860 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 150 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 528,860 who are far from you in Gao, Mali from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
